title: Ticket #6158: kill quill
description:
The quill feature (actually the HAVE_EXT_POSTGRESQL ifdefs) has been turned off for years, we should assume that the code has rotted beyond repair and remove it.

I'm going to start with condor_q, since that's where it gets in my face most.
remarks:
2018-Oct-05 13:42:06 by tim:
Quill was killed in 8.7.1. Resolving
